name: Don't Touch Anything Red
description: Jump, dodge, and control the direction of gravity to survive for as long as possible in Don’t Touch Anything Red, a brand new autorunner for Wii U™ from Helix Games. Red things move fast, so you need to be quick to move out of the way! Dodge on your own or with up to 5 friends with multiplayer. Play on your own with the Wii U™ GamePad, Wii U™ Pro Controller, or even a Wii Remote™. You can even play without the TV, with GamePad-Only support, so you can still keep control of the leaderboards… even if you’re not in control of the TV. In multiplayer, up to 4 players play using Wii Remotes or Wii U Pro Controllers, while a fifth player can cause havoc by using the GamePad touchscreen to craft the most difficult course they can! Choose between either a 4 vs. 1 or a free-for-all versus mode. With great music from the chiptune artist Kubbi, fast-paced gameplay, 5 player multiplayer, and unlimited replayability, it’s a lot of fun! Just make sure to never forget one thing: DON’T TOUCH ANYTHING RED.
